org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.model.login

Class PasswordLoginParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.model.login.LoginParams
      • org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.model.login.PasswordLoginParams

  • public class PasswordLoginParams
extends LoginParams
    Object to pass to a /login call of type password.
